page.title: 11MAGNUM SURVEY
page.content: School children interviewed the manager of the Magnum of the Liesure Centre,Mr.Robertson after they had carried out a sample 100 children in their school. {FINDINGS.}1.Only 52% go to the centre at least once a week.2.some 49% travel by bus although only 2 buses per day go directly from their house estate. 3.The children spend Â£1.25 on per visit on average. 4.Swimming was the favourite attraction for 69%.A half of these wanted a chute in the pool. 5.Only 12% of 10-12 year olds go on their own. {INTERVIEW} Mr. Robertson said that a chute was being built in the answer to the requests of the children.It will be 92m long,but the ride will only last 15secs.He also said that better bus services were planned for the future.
